release instructions:

cd ~/src/sci-util/segway
n001
python setup.py install
cd test
./test.sh
cd ..
## XXX: better if you fix segway so it # runs on all systems
release # must be done on n001
emacsclient ~/etc/bash/load_modules.sh
rm -r $ARCHHOME/bin/segway* $ARCHHOME/lib/segway*
cd test
n001
./test.sh
sage
./test.sh
XXX virtualbox

python <(wget -O - http://noble.gs.washington.edu/proj/segway/install.py)
